episodes.title: Jehovah’s Witness Drinking Problems
episodes.description:
This story is about JW’s and the way that alcohol is used and abused. Often JW’s try to numb themselves with booze and in the case of our beloved friend it had a bitter ending.

❤️‍🩹❤️‍🩹❤️‍🩹❤️‍🩹❤️‍🩹❤️‍🩹❤️‍🩹❤️‍🩹❤️‍🩹❤️‍🩹❤️‍🩹❤️‍🩹❤️‍🩹
“My hope for all sober alcoholics is that they can begin to feel a sense of pride for the courage they have had in facing their addiction and seeking help. Loved ones can be supportive in terms of giving positive feedback even though there may be lingering resentments. There is always time to work through those issues once the individual is stable emotionally and in their sobriety.

May shame turn to pride for all of those who are brave enough to admit they are alcoholic and who seek support and treatment!”
(Benton:l/Psychology Today)

How can you have help from your family etc when you are disfellowshipped?





I hope this video can help anyone who is trying to navigate Through the challenge of leaving a cult and getting out of these entangled situations. 

💚😱🚨 "My Story" of waking up as a 4th Generation Born-in Jehovah's Witness started with my Marriage and a Divorce (previous episode: https://youtu.be/Im4es209-7E?si=ILKJITWjmIN8r7Kl )

episodes.title: Scandals at the Kingdom Hall!
episodes.description:
We are told as Jehovah‘s Witnesses thst we live in a „spiritual paradise“, but is it?

“A spiritual paradise is an environment that is pleasing to the eyes and soothing to the nerves, allowing one to enjoy peace with one’s fellowman and with God. Today, such a paradise exists, and it embraces a growing number of people.  The great difference is the love among the Witnesses.”
W01 3/01

 This is what watchtower claims being among JWs is. 


“answer
 THERE is a paradise on earth today.. the spirtual paradise.
Amazingly, Jehovah has created a serene environment in the midst of a world that Satan has turned into a hate-filled, wicked, and dangerous place. (1 John 5:19; Rev. 12:1” wt 4/24


Is this really true? Im going to compare these quotes with my own life experiences at the kingrom hall in this video. 

😳😳😳😳😳😳😳😀😀😀😀😀😀😀

I hope this video can help anyone who is trying to navigate Through the challenge of leaving a cult and getting out of these entangled situations. 

💚😱🚨 "My Story" of waking up as a 4th Generation Born-in Jehovah's Witness started with my Marriage and a Divorce (previous episode: https://youtu.be/Im4es209-7E?si=ILKJITWjmIN8r7Kl )

episodes.title: Life in the Organization is ROUGH for Children
episodes.description:
This episode is Part 2 to the Episode “Life is Rough for single sisters” and i talk about how little the children matter in this organization, specifically four kids who were in my congregation at the time. What they had to endure was heartbreaking and wrong. This sadly happens all too often within the JW’s. 



I hope this video can help anyone who is trying to navigate Through the challenge of leaving a cult and getting out of these entangled situations. 

💚😱🚨 "My Story" of waking up as a 4th Generation Born-in Jehovah's Witness started with my Marriage and a Divorce (previous episode: https://youtu.be/Im4es209-7E?si=ILKJITWjmIN8r7Kl )

episodes.title: Things that make you go „Hmmmm“…. JW org has hired this guy to defend them, who is he?
episodes.description:
Things that make you go “hmmm”…

At Which Table Are You Feeding?
“You cannot be partaking of ‘the table of Jehovah’ and the table of demons.”​—1 CORINTHIANS 10:21.

Jehovah‘s Witnesses have hired Massimo Introvigne to defend them. Please research this man for yourself as well. 



W94 7/1 said this: 
 

“If for recreation we read fiction, does it feature senseless violence, illicit sex, or occult practices? If we read nonfiction in order to be instructed, does it expound a philosophy or way of life “not according to Christ”? (Colossians 2:8)
…

Jehovah’s table and the table spread by his demonic enemies can never be reconciled!”

…

episodes.title: Life in the Congregation is ROUGH for Single Sisters
episodes.description:
This episode is about my years as a single sister in the foreign language congregation. Not to diminish in any way that others have it rough as well, but I felt like that as a single sister without a head you are open prey for meddling, power-hungry and controlling elders and their wives. 

In this episode I also touch on the subject: 

Does the  Culture and Atmosphere of each individual Congregation depend on the body of elders in every individual hall ? If yes, Where is the worldwide unity?


I hope this video can help anyone who is trying to navigate Through the challenge of leaving a cult and getting out of these entangled situations. 

💚😱🚨 "My Story" of waking up as a 4th Generation Born-in Jehovah's Witness started with my Marriage and a Divorce (previous episode: https://youtu.be/Im4es209-7E?si=ILKJITWjmIN8r7Kl )

episodes.title: The conflict between being a Spirtual Jehovah’s Witness or being a Watchtower “Company Man”
episodes.description:
This is the Story of Lisa and Jack, the two people my Aunt and Grandpa studied with and the conflict that ensued and the mess that it created for years to come resulting in my grandpa and uncle to he deleted without any explanation. And I finally understand why now:  it is The clash between being a Spirtual Jehovah’s Witness or being a Watchtower “Company Man”.

episodes.title: A “Worldy” Husband’s perspective of marrying a former Jehovah’s Witness
episodes.description:
I wanted to interview my Hubby in a candid interview in which he shares very deep and emotional thoughts and perspectives on what it’s like to date a person who grew up in a cult; and his outlook on life and love. He bares his soul, so proud of him! Not an easy thing to do sometimes to share so many personal things but he did it in order to maybe help others. 


✌️


I started this channel in order to tell my life story. “Waking up- My Story” as a 4th Generation born- in Jehovah’s Witness. I am sharing how i navigated leaving the JW’s, moving on and in this Episode I talk about my experience (or lack there of) of dating in the world as a single mom nonetheless. 

 There can be happiness after you leave a cult- always remember that! 💗💗💗


I hope this video can help anyone who is trying to navigate Through the challenge of leaving a cult and getting out of these entangled situations. 

💚😱🚨 "My Story" as a 4th Generation Born-in Jehovah's Witness started with my Marriage and a Divorce (previous episode: https://youtu.be/Im4es209-7E?si=ILKJITWjmIN8r7Kl )

... and then finally here I am waking up from the faith that was my own for all my life and that of my forefathers. What a shock! And all that, with kids!😵

episodes.title: “Happy Ending” Episode 13 of “Waking up- My Story” as a 4th Generation JW
episodes.description:
Freedom! Live your best life after leaving the cult you can really LIVE! To the fullest!

“Waking up- My Story” as a 4th Generation born in Jehovah’s Witness. I am sharing how i navigated leaving the JW’s, moving on and in this Episode I talk about my experience (or lack there of) of dating in the world as a single mom nonetheless. 

 There can be happiness after you leave a cult- always remember that! 💗💗💗


I hope this video can help anyone who is trying to navigate Through the challenge of leaving a cult and getting out of these entangled situations. 

💚😱🚨 "My Story" as a 4th Generation Born-in Jehovah's Witness started with my Marriage and a Divorce (previous episode: https://youtu.be/Im4es209-7E?si=ILKJITWjmIN8r7Kl )

... and then finally here I am waking up from the faith that was my own for all my life and that of my forefathers. What a shock! And all that, with kids!😵

episodes.description:
I hope this Episode can help people date and find love after they leave a cult. It is possible!

Psychology is so helpful of a subject and helps us understand ourselves, ourselves in relationships and others!!
➡️➡️If you take the MBTI drop your personality type in the comment below!!!!! ⬅️⬅️ link: 

http://www.16personalities.com


Also if you take the love language test, would love to hear what your love language is!

episodes.title: “Waking up- My Story” as a 4th Generation born in Jehovah’s Witness-Episode 10
episodes.description:
“Waking up- My Story” as a 4th Generation born in Jehovah’s Witness. I am sharing how i navigated leaving the JW’s, moving on and in this Episode I chat about Dating in the world. 

I also throw in a little discussion about blood fractions and blood transfusions.



I hope this video can help anyone who is trying to navigate Through the challenge of leaving a cult and getting out of these entangled situations. 

 "My Story" as a 4th Generation Born-in Jehovah's Witness started with my Marriage and a Divorce (previous episode: https://youtu.be/Im4es209-7E?si=ILKJITWjmIN8r7Kl )

... and then finally here I am waking up from the faith that was my own for all my life and that of my forefathers. What a shock! And all that, with kids!


Links mentioned:

Interview with Daniel Graves about lives lost in the Organization due to denying blood : https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=thT3BQKkhYo

Blood fractions: 

https://wol.jw.org/en/wol/d/r1/lp-e/2000767



Organ donation/canibalism

https://wol.jw.org/en/wol/d/r1/lp-e/2000767

episodes.title: Waking up- My Story-Episode 9: “Navigating the World”
episodes.description:
First of all, I’m sorry I am fighting some kind of bug so I’m not at my best but still wanted to make this video. My apologies! 


Leaving a cult is so much more than just leaving one thing. It affected us and we, especially as born-ins that have no prior experience being “worldly”, now have to find a way to assimilate and fit into the world and navigate through things, finding out what works for us and what doesn’t! Here’s our story of doing just that. 

I hope this video can help anyone who is trying to manoeuvre through the challenge of leaving a cult and getting out of these entangled situations. 

 "My Story" as a 4th Generation Born-in Jehovah's Witness continues and how we woke up. It all started with my Marriage and a Divorce (previous episode: https://youtu.be/Im4es209-7E?si=ILKJITWjmIN8r7Kl )

... and then finally here I am waking up from the faith that was my own for all my life and that of my forefathers. What a shock! And all that, with kids!



#exjw #exzj #jw #bethel #shunned

episodes.title: Waking up- My Story-Episode 8: “Worldly” People are Kind too”…
episodes.description:
The fear of the world has been instilled in us. The collective narcissism has been deeply engrained. And yet- are worldy people truly bad? In today’s episode I step out into the world and who’s there to help as I navigate life away from the organization. 

I hope this video can help anyone who is trying to navigate Through the challenge of leaving a cult and getting out of these entangled situations. 

 "My Story" as a 4th Generation Born-in Jehovah's Witness continues and how we woke up. It all started with my Marriage and a Divorce (previous episode: https://youtu.be/Im4es209-7E?si=ILKJITWjmIN8r7Kl )

... and then finally here I am waking up from the faith that was my own for all my life and that of my forefathers. What a shock! And all that, with kids!

episodes.title: Waking up- My Story-Episode 7: “My Dad and the Story of how he woke up”
episodes.description:
My dad was one of the youngest elder’s in his congregation and he is the youngest of a huge family, all his siblings born in. His parents joined post-wW2, having been displaced. Never seeing home again, and here was a hope and a community: the Jehovah’s Witnesses. There could be 10 parts of the story of my Dad and his life as a JW but this is mainly the story of how he woke up and got out. 


I hope this video can help anyone who is trying to navigate Through the challenge of leaving a cult and getting out of these entangled situations. 

 "My Story" as a 4th Generation Born-in Jehovah's Witness continues and how we woke up. It all started with my Marriage and a Divorce (previous episode: https://youtu.be/Im4es209-7E?si=ILKJITWjmIN8r7Kl )

... and then finally here I am waking up from the faith that was my own for all my life and that of my forefathers. What a shock! And all that, with kids!

episodes.title: Waking up- My Story-Episode 6: “Fading”.. the extreme measures I took in order to fade
episodes.description:
We woke up- now we have to get off the JW radar. This is what we did in order to shake the feeling that we are now on Satan’s side and everything bad will happen to us- and instead really good things happened. Good things that “worldly” people helped us with. 


I hope this video can help anyone who is trying to navigate Through the challenge of leaving a cult and getting out of these entangled situations. 

 "My Story" as a 4th Generation Born-in Jehovah's Witness continues and how we woke up. It all started with my Marriage and a Divorce (previous episode: https://youtu.be/Im4es209-7E?si=ILKJITWjmIN8r7Kl )

... and then finally here I am waking up from the faith that was my own for all my life and that of my forefathers. What a shock! And all that, with kids!

episodes.title: This was mind-blowing to find out for me 🤯🤯🤯🤯🤯
episodes.description:
Things that make you go “hmmm”…
Jehovah‘s Witnesses always vilify the UN. So it was a complete shock to me that they had applied and actually became NGO members of the UN themselves. Do your research into this. A good site is 

https://www.jwfacts.com/watchtower/united-nations-association.php

Also the Guardian reports.

episodes.title: Waking up- My Story-Episode 5: “Breaking up (with your jw friends) is hard to do”
episodes.description:
Bear with me, this conversation with 2 of my bff’s is wild. They actually stuck it out longer than most JW’s would, and they end up retorting to ways to try to get me back at the end of the conversation that is, well, actually illegal. Hang on for the ride! 

I hope this video can help anyone who is trying to navigate Through the challenge of leaving a cult and getting out of these entangled situations. 

 "My Story" as a 4th Generation Born-in Jehovah's Witness continues and how we woke up. It all started with my Marriage and a Divorce (previous episode: https://youtu.be/Im4es209-7E?si=ILKJITWjmIN8r7Kl )

... and then finally here I am waking up from the faith that was my own for all my life and that of my forefathers. What a shock! And all that, with kids!

episodes.title: Waking up- My Story-Episode 4: “Leaving a Cult with Kids”
episodes.description:
You need to leave a high control group. Maybe doing this on your own is one thing but now you have kids who you raised to be a part of this; and you learned it’s all wrong. How do you leave with kids? 

This is how we did it! 

I hope this video can help parents navigate Through the challenge of leaving a cult as a family. 

 "My Story" as a 4th Generation Born-in Jehovah's Witness continues and how we woke up. It all started with my Marriage and a Divorce (previous episodes of the story are on my channel)... and then finally here I am waking up from the faith that was my own for all my life and that of my forefathers. What a shock! And all that, with kids!

episodes.description:

episodes.title: Episode 19: Who The Heck Did I Marry? JW Edition “Trapped”
episodes.description:
In Episode 19: Who The Heck Did I Marry? JW Edition “Trapped” I go over some more insane stories about the Jehovah’s Witness Rule to “be scritpurally free to remarry” which traps so many Jehovah’s witnesses in limbo of being married before God but “single and divorced in the world”. Lives have been ruined. Man-made rules have been made. And people suffer. Here are some more stories about this subject! Please do share yours in the comments.


#jehovahswitnesses #jehovahswitness #jw #marriage #family #divorce #traumabond #exjw #exzj #exjz #testigosdejehova #testigos #traumabond #trauma #traumahealing #therapy #therpayaudiobooks #selfhelp #sexaddiction #sexaddict #babyssteps

episodes.title: Episode 18:  Who The Heck Did I Marry? JW Edition    “Scripturally Free?”
episodes.description:
In Episode 18:  Who The Heck Did I Marry? JW Edition    “Scripturally Free?” I talk about the plight of separating, divorcing and being “scripturally free”. In the Jehovah’s Witness world there has to be adultery in order to be viewed as “free to remarry”. I had to meet with the elders to determine this status and the burden of proof was with me: this meeting was unbelievably shocking. Listen in to hear my story.

episodes.title: Episode 17: Who The Heck Did I Marry? JW Edition “Steps”
episodes.description:
This is Episode 17 of “Who The Heck Did I Marry? JW Edition” “Steps”. Breaking up and getting out of a trauma bond is journey. You have to actively work against being pulled back into the trauma bond. It took many steps. So many things that Troy did and the Religion contributed to this. Baby Steps!

Listen to my journey of breaking free!

episodes.title: Jehovah’s Witness Stories of Pants and Beards
episodes.description:
We are all surprised with the new Governing Body Update about Pants for Women (now “allowed”!) and Beards now “allowed” for men. So here are some of the Jehovah’s Witness Stories of Pants and Beards that I have experienced in the Org. 



#exzj #pants #womenspants  #womenpant #beards #beardsonmen #jwbeards #jwbeard #exjwbeard #jw #exjz #religion #cult #jehovahswitnesses #governingbody

episodes.title: Episode 16: Who The Heck Did I Marry? JW Edition “I Never Knew Him”
episodes.description:
In Episode 16: Who The Heck Did I Marry? JW Edition i realize the man who i was living with for 11 years , the man who is the father of my children, is not a person I ever knew nor do I want to spend my life with: he isn’t even a person I would be friends with. It is time to leave: which isn’t too easy as a Jehovah’s Witness without “grounds for divorce”. Listen to my journey of breaking free!

episodes.title: Episode 15: Who The Heck Did I Marry? JW Edition “Breaking Point”
episodes.description:
In Episode 15: Who The Heck Did I Marry? JW Edition “Breaking Point” Troy was reinstated, talking the spiritual talk at meetings, service, and yet I am learning who he really is and the person that I’m getting to know is someone I know I need to remove myself from. But how?

episodes.description: In Episode 13: Who The Heck Did I Marry? JW Edition “Punched” the story takes you not where you expect but adds trauma to the entire burning building that was my marriage.

episodes.title: In Episode 12: Who The Heck Did I Marry? JW Edition “Disfellowshipped“
episodes.description: In Episode 12: Who The Heck Did I Marry? JW Edition - “Disfellowshipped“ I talk about my marriage taking a nose dive. A nose dive so deep, can it even be salvaged?

episodes.title: Episode 11: Who The Heck Did I Marry? JW Edition “the Funeral”
episodes.description:
In Episode 11 of “Who The Heck Did I Marry? JW Edition” -“the Funeral”- I tell the story of the madness surrounding my sweet and kind grandpa’s passing and his memorial service at the Kingdom Hall. 
Jehovah’s witnesses are taught that they will not get old and that Armageddon will come any day now so many aren’t prepared for retirement and old age. We weren’t prepared for grandpa dying. We were brought up, born into this religion that teaches us, brainwashed us that we won’t have to worry about any of those things. It was a shock. And the events surrounding his death were also
A shock.

episodes.title: Episode 10: Who The Heck Did I Marry? JW Edition “Grandpa”
Episode 9- Who The Heck Did I Marry? JW Edition “Truth Bombs”
episodes.description: Episode 9 : “Truth Bombs”. In this Episode I talk about what life in a cult is like and how it affects you in every aspect of your life. I also talk about Therapy and the truth bombs that were revealed during the sessions. Enjoy the show, the ride isn’t over for a while yet!

episodes.title: Episode 8: Who The Heck Did I Marry? JW Edition  “The Brother”
episodes.description:
In Episode 8: Who The Heck Did I Marry? JW Edition  “The Brother” I elaborate a little bit more about the aura of shadiness that surrounds the Brother and how it was validated. Trust your gut, especially with your children!
I also detail how it was finding a therapist and how it really helped to be able to talk about all this madness. 

#exjw #exzj #jw #bethel #shunned

episodes.title: Episode 7: Who The Heck Did I Marry? Jehovah’s Witness Edition “the Incident”
episodes.description: In Episode 7: Who The Heck Did I Marry? JW Edition “The Incident” I talk about a major happening. Throughout the years little things kept trickling out; accumulating; adding up, stacking up. But this one was one major blow (no pun intended) and I will never forget the night it happened. Keyword: Tiger Woods.

episodes.title: Episode 6: Who The Heck Did I Marry? JWEdition "the No Show"
episodes.description:
In Episode 6: Who The Heck Did I Marry? JW Edition
"No Show" a pattern emerges in Troy's ways and being there for your family is not one of his traits.
Sie weird stuff went down in year one and two and the story goes on! Listen and enjoy!

episodes.title: Episode 5: Who The Heck Did I Marry? JW Edition “Paper. Cut.”
episodes.description:
The first anniversary is paper. Well this marriage is like a paper cut, already. In year one. And I’m slowly starting to bleed out. The ways abuse starts and creates trauma bonding. Feelings of I should leave, already. In the first year. I should have and I know that, I wish I did earlier but I could not get out of it at the time.
Another drinking story and an ambulance ride. Hold on tight, the ride goes on!

#exjw #exzj #jw #bethel #shunned

episodes.title: Episode 4: Who The Heck Did I Marry? JW Edition “Honeyhell”
episodes.description:
In Episode 4: Who The Heck Did I Marry? JW Edition I tell the story of the Honeymoon and the Silent Treatment. I had gotten sick on our Honeymoon, which sucks but why is this man I married not speaking to me on what is supposed to be our happiest time? Find out and listen!
